external_references.source_name: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence VMWare ESXi Zero-Day 2023
external_references.description: Alexander Marvi, Brad Slaybaugh, Ron Craft, and Rufus Brown. (2023, June 13). VMware ESXi Zero-Day Used by Chinese Espionage Actor to Perform Privileged Guest Operations on Compromised Hypervisors. Retrieved March 26, 2025.

external_references.source_name: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence ESXi VIBs 2022
external_references.description: Alexander Marvi, Jeremy Koppen, Tufail Ahmed, and Jonathan Lepore. (2022, September 29). Bad VIB(E)s Part One: Investigating Novel Malware Persistence Within ESXi Hypervisors. Retrieved March 26, 2025.

objects.description: [UNC3886](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1048) has used `vmtoolsd.exe` to enumerate files on guest machines.(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence ESXi VIBs 2022)(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence VMWare ESXi Zero-Day 2023)
